snippet: From taxi drivers to professors, many care deeply about what's happening and have turned to humor to deal with their frustration at the gap between what they want to know and what the government wants them to know.
abstract: From taxi drivers to professors, many care deeply about what's happening and have turned to humor to deal with their frustration at the gap between what they want to know and what the government wants them to know.

headline.main: Shut Out of Party Congress and Power Transfer, Chinese Citizens Turn to Humor
